backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, reminder settings, and application logs with access control and CRUD-style query/update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding an empty reminder settings map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend files to feature requirements and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and warm-themed OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication flow, profile setup, and rendering the home experience.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper with header, reminder UI integration, footer, and user name display.
frontend/src/components/ApplicationEntry: Form for submitting new job application entries with company, role, notes, and success callback.
frontend/src/components/FlameMomentumBad: Renders an animated flame icon that switches between flicker and burst styles based on a celebrate flag.
frontend/src/components/InAppReminderBan: Displays a dismissible in-app reminder banner encouraging the user to log applications.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic error handling.
frontend/src/components/RecentEntriesLis: Fetches and displays a sortable list of recent job application entries with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ReminderSettings: A dialog allowing users to enable and configure daily reminder times, with save and loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the authenticated identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and persisted identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, application entries, and reminder settings using the backend actor.
Schedules daily reminders based on user settings and triggers in-app or browser notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Home screen showing application count, motivational UI, entry form, and recent entries list with celebration behavior.
frontend/src/utils/motivation.ts: Provides functions to generate motivational messages and compute next milestones based on application count.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, retrieving, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requirements, and current app state for the job-hunt tracker.
